definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)

sentences.english: While Jim was mending his bike, Lin Tao came to see him.
sentences.chinese: 合法吉姆修自行车时，林涛来看他。

sentences.english: This class can only be taken with the professor's approval.
sentences.chinese: 这个课必须要有教授的许可才可以修。

sentences.english: Mentors are not to repair robots or be involved in programming of students' robots.
sentences.chinese: 不允许教練修復机械人或是參与编写程序。

sentences.english: There's a businessman named Rob in one of my classes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位叫做罗勃的商人跟我修同一门课。

sentences.english: The eldest Kasyapa's disciples were in rags and practiced a Dhuta practice.
sentences.chinese: 大伽叶的弟子衣衫褴褛，他们修的是头陀行。

sentences.english: I take world history as my major.
sentences.chinese: 我以教育心理学为主修专业。

sentences.english: Qin Shihuang had the Great Wall built to keep the enemy out of his empire.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇修长城是为了不让敌人进入他的帝国。

sentences.english: We prefer that each new student take a science course.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望每位新生修一门理科课程。

sentences.english: He can repair cares? I cannot believe it.
sentences.chinese: 他能修汽车？我真不敢相信。

sentences.english: It's not till late afternoon that the electrician began to repair the winch.
sentences.chinese: 直到下午很晚电工才开始修起货机。

sentences.english: We are going to build a new bridge here.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算在这里修一座新桥。

sentences.english: You'll need to take your shoes to the cobblers to have them mended.
sentences.chinese: 你得把鞋子拿到补鞋匠那里修一下。

sentences.english: Mr. Li will have his car repaired tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 李先生明天要请人修他的车。

sentences.english: To realize repair of signal equipment according to condition is the final target of repair and maintenance of signal and communication equipment.
sentences.chinese: 实现信号设备状态修，是电务设备维护的最终目标。

sentences.english: Every mayor who takes office will repair a road, support a bridge.
sentences.chinese: 每上任一个市长就要修一次路，架一座桥。

sentences.english: Small kingdom built huge walls aiming at protecting their territories.
sentences.chinese: 诸侯国修起城墙，借以保护他们的领土。

definition: to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to reconstruct/to repair/to revamp/to revise/to retake a failed course
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism)/to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft
to enter the Way/to become a Daoist
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
